title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2386/84 of 13 August 1984 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2406/83 on the grant of aid for the use in wine-making of concentrated grape must and rectified concentrated grape must in respect of the 1983/84 wine-growing year
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2386/84
of 13 August 1984
amending Regulation (EEC) No 2406/83 on the grant of aid for the use in wine-making of concentrated grape must and rectified concentrated grape must in respect of the 1983/84 wine-growing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 August 1984.
For the Commission
Ătienne DAVIGNON
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 54, 5. 3. 1979, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 115, 1. 5. 1984, p. 77.
(3) OJ No L 236, 26. 8. 1983, p. 13.
